professional_summary: Experienced SQL Database Administrator with expertise in performance tuning, backup/recovery strategies, and high-availability environments. Skilled in administering MS SQL Server databases across production and non-production environments, with a focus on security management and capacity planning.

key_responsibilities: Administering MS SQL Server databases in an enterprise production environment.
Performing database performance tuning and query optimization.
Administering SQL Server databases in production
